owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

params.name: Human-readable agent name
params.signingKey: Address used for signing (can be same as msg.sender)
params.stakeAmount: Amount of USDC to stake (must be >= minStake)

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

params.newSigningKey: New address to use for signing

params.messageHash: Hash of the message that was signed

params.amount: USDC amount to stake as vouch

linkPlatform(string).notice: Link a platform account to your identity

verifySignature(bytes32,bytes32,bytes).notice: Verify a signature was made by an agent's signing key

vouch(bytes32,uint256).notice: Vouch for another agent by staking USDC

withdrawVouch(bytes32).notice: Withdraw your vouch for an agent
